name: The Beast of the Rosewood
description:
This Visual Novel was made for NaNoRenO 2023

Synopsis:

Percival left his comfortable home to research the legends of the local villages. Eager to find and research a thrilling supernatural tale, fortune, and perhaps love, finds him when a mysterious hunter tells him about the beast that’s said to haunt his village’s surrounding woods.

Content Warnings:
  • Blood
  • Death
  • Spiders
Features:
  • ~28,000 words
  • M/M Romance
  • 2 potential romantic routes
  • 8 endings
Made By:

 https://wispna.tumblr.com/

https://jellyfilledart.tumblr.com/
